about_the_game:
Red Trees Rail Co is a Virtual Reality Horror Train simulator that puts you in the seat of a steam train operator.

There is a recent need for a night train from town to town in the lovely Redwood Forest. It is cozy, dark, and quiet.
To keep costs low, a once decommissioned steam engine will now be brought back to service with a few modern upgrades.
However, recent reports have noted creepy sightings and unusual events occurring on this train route.

Exploring this new opportunity, you play as a character who is trying to pay off some debt.

Operator Duties include:
  • Driving the Train using Realistic Locomotive Controls
  • Picking Up and Dropping Off Passengers at Stations
  • Checking Passenger Tickets

You may experience hallucinations during your journey. Some see ghosts, wrecked interior, and more.

Thankfully, you are provided the past engineer's notebook for info and survival.

Can You Stay Calm and Survive the Night?
